name: OR_SCRIPT
description: This table contains general information about the Surgical Log Script (ORS) records.

columns.name: OR_SCRIPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Surgical Log Script associated with the information contained in this table.

columns.name: OR_SCRIPT_ID_OR_SCRIPT_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of the associated Surgical Log Script record.

columns.name: OR_SCRIPT_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of the associated Surgical Log Script record.
